case.name: Scar
case.description: After removing her dress, Misato's scar is visible

trigger.state: I got this scar during the second impact...
I got this scar after I survived the second impact...
Not even this ugly scar will make me feel ashamed.
I know it's not a good sight...
Not even this ugly scar can make me look bad!
A little gift from the second impact...
I know it's an ugly sight... I'm sorry...
I know it doesn't look good...sorry.
I know it looks bad... I'm sorry.
